"VisionWear": A smart contact lens with built-in OCR (Optical Character Recognition) capabilities, allowing visually impaired individuals to read text and recognize objects in their surroundings with ease. Confidence score: 0.9/1
"EchoBuddy": A wearable device that uses echolocation technology to provide real-time audio feedback to help visually impaired individuals navigate their surroundings. Confidence score: 0.8/1

"TactileVision": A tactile display system that projects 3D images onto a specialized glove, allowing visually impaired individuals to feel and identify objects in their environment. Confidence score: 0.9/1

"VoiceOverLamp": A smart lamp that uses AI-powered voice assistance to help visually impaired individuals navigate their surroundings, control their environment, and access information. Confidence score: 0.8/1

"SmartCane": An intelligent white cane that uses sensors and AI to detect obstacles and provide real-time feedback to help visually impaired individuals navigate their surroundings more safely and efficiently. Confidence score: 0.9/1
